page.title: 11Leisure Time..
page.content: Outside the home. Going for walks 13,Fishing with daddy 4,Playing with dolls and prams 4,Gymnastics 2,Horse riding 4,Playing at the recreation ground on swings 9. Various other activities were mentioned,helping daddy in the garden,snaring with grampy,taking the dog for a walk. Inside the home. Playing with lorries,cars,fire engines 15.Other small toys,dolls,teddies, threading beads.Playing school,with blackboard 13, play houses 3.Table games,snap 9.Watching television-all. Programmes watched included Playschool, Blue Peter 17,Rainbow-all.Dungeons and Dragons,Incredible Hulk,He Man. Computer games 5. Reading 14..
